name: Click Sounds
description: Plays a sound whenever you press a jump button.

OnlyOnJump.name: Only play on jump
OnlyOnJump.description: Doesn't play sound on movement of platformer keys

enable-clicksound.name: Enable click sounds
enable-clicksound.description: Enable or disable click sounds without restarting the game!

clicksound-currentsound.name: Current click sound
clicksound-currentsound.description: Change the click sound. Negative numbers for meme sounds, 0 for custom sounds, and positive numbers for useful sounds. Check mod description for a sound list.

custom-clicksound.name: Upload a custom click sound
custom-clicksound.description: Select a .ogg, .wav, .mp3, .m4a, or .flac format file to set as click sound 0. The best practice is to use a .ogg format sound that start loudly and immediately.

releasesound-currentsound.name: Current release sound
releasesound-currentsound.description: Change the click sound. Negative numbers for meme sounds, 0 for custom sounds, and positive numbers for useful sounds. Check mod description for a sound list.

custom-releasesound.name: Upload a custom release sound
custom-releasesound.description: Select a .ogg, .wav, .mp3, .m4a, or .flac format file to set as release sound 0. The best practice is to use a .ogg format sound that start loudly and immediately.

settings-button.name: Show settings button
settings-button.description: When enabled, a settings button appears in the pause menu.
